00030 
00033 void BMacLayer::initialize(int stage)
00034 {
00035   BaseMacLayer::initialize(stage);
00036 
00037     if (stage == 0) {
00038 
00039     queueLength = hasPar("queueLength") ? par("queueLength") : 10;
00040     animation = hasPar("animation") ? par("animation") : true;
00041     slotDuration = hasPar("slotDuration") ? par("slotDuration") : 1;
00042     bitrate = hasPar("bitrate") ? par("bitrate") : 15360;
00043     headerLength = hasPar("headerLength") ? par("headerLength") : 10;
00044     checkInterval = hasPar("checkInterval") ? par("checkInterval") : 0.1;
00045     txPower = hasPar("txPower") ? par("txPower") : 50;
00046     useMacAcks = hasPar("useMACAcks") ? par("useMACAcks") : false;
00047     maxTxAttempts = hasPar("maxTxAttempts") ? par("maxTxAttempts") : 2;
00048     debugEV << "headerLength: " << headerLength << ", bitrate: " << bitrate << endl;
00049 
00050     stats = par("stats");
00051     nbTxDataPackets = 0;
00052     nbTxPreambles = 0;
00053     nbRxDataPackets = 0;
00054     nbRxPreambles = 0;
00055     nbMissedAcks = 0;
00056     nbRecvdAcks=0;
00057     nbDroppedDataPackets=0;
00058     nbTxAcks=0;
00059 
00060     txAttempts = 0;
00061     lastDataPktDestAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00062     lastDataPktSrcAddr  = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00063 
00064     macState = INIT;
00065 
00066     // init the dropped packet info
00067     droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::NONE);
00068     nicId = getNic()->getId();
00069     WATCH(macState);
00070     }
00071 
00072     else if(stage == 1) {
00073 
00074     wakeup = new cMessage("wakeup");
00075     wakeup->setKind(BMAC_WAKE_UP);
00076 
00077     data_timeout = new cMessage("data_timeout");
00078     data_timeout->setKind(BMAC_DATA_TIMEOUT);
00079     data_timeout->setSchedulingPriority(100);
00080 
00081     data_tx_over = new cMessage("data_tx_over");
00082     data_tx_over->setKind(BMAC_DATA_TX_OVER);
00083 
00084     stop_preambles = new cMessage("stop_preambles");
00085     stop_preambles->setKind(BMAC_STOP_PREAMBLES);
00086 
00087     send_preamble = new cMessage("send_preamble");
00088     send_preamble->setKind(BMAC_SEND_PREAMBLE);
00089 
00090     ack_tx_over = new cMessage("ack_tx_over");
00091     ack_tx_over->setKind(BMAC_ACK_TX_OVER);
00092 
00093     cca_timeout = new cMessage("cca_timeout");
00094     cca_timeout->setKind(BMAC_CCA_TIMEOUT);
00095     cca_timeout->setSchedulingPriority(100);
00096 
00097     send_ack = new cMessage("send_ack");
00098     send_ack->setKind(BMAC_SEND_ACK);
00099 
00100     start_bmac = new cMessage("start_bmac");
00101     start_bmac->setKind(BMAC_START_BMAC);
00102 
00103     ack_timeout = new cMessage("ack_timeout");
00104     ack_timeout->setKind(BMAC_ACK_TIMEOUT);
00105 
00106     resend_data = new cMessage("resend_data");
00107     resend_data->setKind(BMAC_RESEND_DATA);
00108     resend_data->setSchedulingPriority(100);
00109 
00110     scheduleAt(0.0, start_bmac);
00111     }
00112 }
00113 
00114 BMacLayer::~BMacLayer()
00115 {
00116   cancelAndDelete(wakeup);
00117   cancelAndDelete(data_timeout);
00118   cancelAndDelete(data_tx_over);
00119   cancelAndDelete(stop_preambles);
00120   cancelAndDelete(send_preamble);
00121   cancelAndDelete(ack_tx_over);
00122   cancelAndDelete(cca_timeout);
00123   cancelAndDelete(send_ack);
00124   cancelAndDelete(start_bmac);
00125   cancelAndDelete(ack_timeout);
00126   cancelAndDelete(resend_data);
00127 
00128   MacQueue::iterator it;
00129   for(it = macQueue.begin(); it != macQueue.end(); ++it)
00130   {
00131     delete (*it);
00132   }
00133   macQueue.clear();
00134 }
00135 
00136 void BMacLayer::finish()
00137 {
00138     BaseMacLayer::finish();
00139 
00140     // record stats
00141     if (stats)
00142     {
00143       recordScalar("nbTxDataPackets", nbTxDataPackets);
00144       recordScalar("nbTxPreambles", nbTxPreambles);
00145       recordScalar("nbRxDataPackets", nbRxDataPackets);
00146       recordScalar("nbRxPreambles", nbRxPreambles);
00147       recordScalar("nbMissedAcks", nbMissedAcks);
00148       recordScalar("nbRecvdAcks", nbRecvdAcks);
00149       recordScalar("nbTxAcks", nbTxAcks);
00150       recordScalar("nbDroppedDataPackets", nbDroppedDataPackets);
00151       //recordScalar("timeSleep", timeSleep);
00152       //recordScalar("timeRX", timeRX);
00153       //recordScalar("timeTX", timeTX);
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00162 void BMacLayer::handleUpperMsg(cMessage *msg)
00163 {
00164   bool pktAdded = addToQueue(msg);
00165   if (!pktAdded)
00166     return;
00167   // force wakeup now
00168   if (wakeup->isScheduled() && (macState == SLEEP))
00169   {
00170     cancelEvent(wakeup);
00171     scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand()*0.1f, wakeup);
00172   }
00173 }
00174 
00178 void BMacLayer::sendPreamble()
00179 {
00180   MacPkt* preamble = new MacPkt();
00181   preamble->setSrcAddr(myMacAddr);
00182   preamble->setDestAddr(LAddress::L2BROADCAST);
00183   preamble->setKind(BMAC_PREAMBLE);
00184   preamble->setBitLength(headerLength);
00185 
00186   //attach signal and send down
00187   attachSignal(preamble);
00188   sendDown(preamble);
00189   nbTxPreambles++;
00190 }
00191 
00195 void BMacLayer::sendMacAck()
00196 {
00197   MacPkt* ack = new MacPkt();
00198   ack->setSrcAddr(myMacAddr);
00199   ack->setDestAddr(lastDataPktSrcAddr);
00200   ack->setKind(BMAC_ACK);
00201   ack->setBitLength(headerLength);
00202 
00203   //attach signal and send down
00204   attachSignal(ack);
00205   sendDown(ack);
00206   nbTxAcks++;
00207   //endSimulation();
00208 }

00210 
00211 
00224 void BMacLayer::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg)
00225 {
00226   switch (macState)
00227   {
00228   case INIT:
00229     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_START_BMAC)
00230     {
00231       debugEV << "State INIT, message BMAC_START, new state SLEEP" << endl;
00232       changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00233       phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00234       macState = SLEEP;
00235       scheduleAt(simTime()+dblrand()*slotDuration, wakeup);
00236       return;
00237     }
00238     break;
00239   case SLEEP:
00240     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_WAKE_UP)
00241     {
00242       debugEV << "State SLEEP, message BMAC_WAKEUP, new state CCA" << endl;
00243       scheduleAt(simTime() + checkInterval, cca_timeout);
00244       phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00245       changeDisplayColor(GREEN);
00246       macState = CCA;
00247       return;
00248     }
00249     break;
00250   case CCA:
00251     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_CCA_TIMEOUT)
00252     {
00253       // channel is clear
00254       // something waiting in eth queue?
00255       if (macQueue.size() > 0)
00256       {
00257         debugEV << "State CCA, message CCA_TIMEOUT, new state"
00258               " SEND_PREAMBLE" << endl;
00259         phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00260         changeDisplayColor(YELLOW);
00261         macState = SEND_PREAMBLE;
00262         scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, stop_preambles);
00263         return;
00264       }
00265       // if not, go back to sleep and wake up after a full period
00266       else
00267       {
00268         debugEV << "State CCA, message CCA_TIMEOUT, new state SLEEP"
00269              << endl;
00270         scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, wakeup);
00271         macState = SLEEP;
00272         phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00273         changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00274         return;
00275       }
00276     }
00277     // during CCA, we received a preamble. Go to state WAIT_DATA and
00278     // schedule the timeout.
00279     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_PREAMBLE)
00280     {
00281       nbRxPreambles++;
00282       debugEV << "State CCA, message BMAC_PREAMBLE received, new state"
00283             " WAIT_DATA" << endl;
00284       macState = WAIT_DATA;
00285       cancelEvent(cca_timeout);
00286       scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration + checkInterval, data_timeout);
00287       delete msg;
00288       return;
00289     }
00290     // this case is very, very, very improbable, but let's do it.
00291     // if in CCA and the node receives directly the data packet, switch to
00292     // state WAIT_DATA and re-send the message
00293     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_DATA)
00294     {
00295       nbRxDataPackets++;
00296       debugEV << "State CCA, message BMAC_DATA, new state WAIT_DATA"
00297            << endl;
00298       macState = WAIT_DATA;
00299       cancelEvent(cca_timeout);
00300       scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration + checkInterval, data_timeout);
00301       scheduleAt(simTime(), msg);
00302       return;
00303     }
00304     //in case we get an ACK, we simply dicard it, because it means the end
00305     //of another communication
00306     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_ACK)
00307     {
00308       debugEV << "State CCA, message BMAC_ACK, new state CCA" << endl;
00309       delete msg;
00310       return;
00311     }
00312     break;
00313 
00314   case SEND_PREAMBLE:
00315     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_SEND_PREAMBLE)
00316     {
00317       debugEV << "State SEND_PREAMBLE, message BMAC_SEND_PREAMBLE, new"
00318             " state SEND_PREAMBLE" << endl;
00319       sendPreamble();
00320       scheduleAt(simTime() + 0.5f*checkInterval, send_preamble);
00321       macState = SEND_PREAMBLE;
00322       return;
00323     }
00324     // simply change the state to SEND_DATA
00325     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_STOP_PREAMBLES)
00326     {
00327       debugEV << "State SEND_PREAMBLE, message BMAC_STOP_PREAMBLES, new"
00328             " state SEND_DATA" << endl;
00329       macState = SEND_DATA;
00330       txAttempts = 1;
00331       return;
00332     }
00333     break;
00334 
00335   case SEND_DATA:
00336     if ((msg->getKind() == BMAC_SEND_PREAMBLE)
00337       || (msg->getKind() == BMAC_RESEND_DATA))
00338     {
00339       debugEV << "State SEND_DATA, message BMAC_SEND_PREAMBLE or"
00340             " BMAC_RESEND_DATA, new state WAIT_TX_DATA_OVER" << endl;
00341       // send the data packet
00342       sendDataPacket();
00343       macState = WAIT_TX_DATA_OVER;
00344       return;
00345     }
00346     break;
00347 
00348   case WAIT_TX_DATA_OVER:
00349     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_DATA_TX_OVER)
00350     {
00351       if ((useMacAcks) && !LAddress::isL2Broadcast( lastDataPktDestAddr ))
00352       {
00353         debugEV << "State WAIT_TX_DATA_OVER, message BMAC_DATA_TX_OVER,"
00354               " new state WAIT_ACK" << endl;
00355         macState = WAIT_ACK;
00356         phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00357         changeDisplayColor(GREEN);
00358         scheduleAt(simTime()+checkInterval, ack_timeout);
00359       }
00360       else
00361       {
00362         debugEV << "State WAIT_TX_DATA_OVER, message BMAC_DATA_TX_OVER,"
00363               " new state  SLEEP" << endl;
00364         delete macQueue.front();
00365         macQueue.pop_front();
00366         // if something in the queue, wakeup soon.
00367         if (macQueue.size() > 0)
00368           scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand()*checkInterval, wakeup);
00369         else
00370           scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, wakeup);
00371         macState = SLEEP;
00372         phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00373         changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00374       }
00375       return;
00376     }
00377     break;
00378   case WAIT_ACK:
00379     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_ACK_TIMEOUT)
00380     {
00381       // No ACK received. try again or drop.
00382       if (txAttempts < maxTxAttempts)
00383       {
00384         debugEV << "State WAIT_ACK, message BMAC_ACK_TIMEOUT, new state"
00385               " SEND_DATA" << endl;
00386         txAttempts++;
00387         macState = SEND_PREAMBLE;
00388         scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, stop_preambles);
00389         phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00390         changeDisplayColor(YELLOW);
00391       }
00392       else
00393       {
00394         debugEV << "State WAIT_ACK, message BMAC_ACK_TIMEOUT, new state"
00395               " SLEEP" << endl;
00396         //drop the packet
00397         delete macQueue.front();
00398         macQueue.pop_front();
00399         // if something in the queue, wakeup soon.
00400         if (macQueue.size() > 0)
00401           scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand()*checkInterval, wakeup);
00402         else
00403           scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, wakeup);
00404         macState = SLEEP;
00405         phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00406         changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00407         nbMissedAcks++;
00408       }
00409       return;
00410     }
00411     //ignore and other packets
00412     if ((msg->getKind() == BMAC_DATA) || (msg->getKind() == BMAC_PREAMBLE))
00413     {
00414       debugEV << "State WAIT_ACK, message BMAC_DATA or BMAC_PREMABLE, new"
00415             " state WAIT_ACK" << endl;
00416       delete msg;
00417       return;
00418     }
00419     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_ACK)
00420     {
00421       debugEV << "State WAIT_ACK, message BMAC_ACK" << endl;
00422       MacPkt*                 mac = static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg);
00423       const LAddress::L2Type& src = mac->getSrcAddr();
00424       // the right ACK is received..
00425       debugEV << "We are waiting for ACK from : " << lastDataPktDestAddr
00426            << ", and ACK came from : " << src << endl;
00427       if (src == lastDataPktDestAddr)
00428       {
00429         debugEV << "New state SLEEP" << endl;
00430         nbRecvdAcks++;
00431         lastDataPktDestAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00432         cancelEvent(ack_timeout);
00433         delete macQueue.front();
00434         macQueue.pop_front();
00435         // if something in the queue, wakeup soon.
00436         if (macQueue.size() > 0)
00437           scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand()*checkInterval, wakeup);
00438         else
00439           scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, wakeup);
00440         macState = SLEEP;
00441         phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00442         changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00443         lastDataPktDestAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00444       }
00445       delete msg;
00446       return;
00447     }
00448     break;
00449   case WAIT_DATA:
00450     if(msg->getKind() == BMAC_PREAMBLE)
00451     {
00452       //nothing happens
00453       debugEV << "State WAIT_DATA, message BMAC_PREAMBLE, new state"
00454             " WAIT_DATA" << endl;
00455       nbRxPreambles++;
00456       delete msg;
00457       return;
00458     }
00459     if(msg->getKind() == BMAC_ACK)
00460     {
00461       //nothing happens
00462       debugEV << "State WAIT_DATA, message BMAC_ACK, new state WAIT_DATA"
00463            << endl;
00464       delete msg;
00465       return;
00466     }
00467     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_DATA)
00468     {
00469       nbRxDataPackets++;
00470       MacPkt*                 mac  = static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg);
00471       const LAddress::L2Type& dest = mac->getDestAddr();
00472       const LAddress::L2Type& src  = mac->getSrcAddr();
00473       if ((dest == myMacAddr) || LAddress::isL2Broadcast(dest)) {
00474         sendUp(decapsMsg(mac));
00475       } else {
00476         delete msg;
00477         msg = NULL;
00478         mac = NULL;
00479       }
00480 
00481       cancelEvent(data_timeout);
00482       if ((useMacAcks) && (dest == myMacAddr))
00483       {
00484         debugEV << "State WAIT_DATA, message BMAC_DATA, new state"
00485               " SEND_ACK" << endl;
00486         macState = SEND_ACK;
00487         lastDataPktSrcAddr = src;
00488         phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00489         changeDisplayColor(YELLOW);
00490       }
00491       else
00492       {
00493         debugEV << "State WAIT_DATA, message BMAC_DATA, new state SLEEP"
00494              << endl;
00495         // if something in the queue, wakeup soon.
00496         if (macQueue.size() > 0)
00497           scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand()*checkInterval, wakeup);
00498         else
00499           scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, wakeup);
00500         macState = SLEEP;
00501         phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00502         changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00503       }
00504       return;
00505     }
00506     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_DATA_TIMEOUT)
00507     {
00508       debugEV << "State WAIT_DATA, message BMAC_DATA_TIMEOUT, new state"
00509             " SLEEP" << endl;
00510       // if something in the queue, wakeup soon.
00511       if (macQueue.size() > 0)
00512         scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand()*checkInterval, wakeup);
00513       else
00514         scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, wakeup);
00515       macState = SLEEP;
00516       phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00517       changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00518       return;
00519     }
00520     break;
00521   case SEND_ACK:
00522     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_SEND_ACK)
00523     {
00524       debugEV << "State SEND_ACK, message BMAC_SEND_ACK, new state"
00525             " WAIT_ACK_TX" << endl;
00526       // send now the ack packet
00527       sendMacAck();
00528       macState = WAIT_ACK_TX;
00529       return;
00530     }
00531     break;
00532   case WAIT_ACK_TX:
00533     if (msg->getKind() == BMAC_ACK_TX_OVER)
00534     {
00535       debugEV << "State WAIT_ACK_TX, message BMAC_ACK_TX_OVER, new state"
00536             " SLEEP" << endl;
00537       // ack sent, go to sleep now.
00538       // if something in the queue, wakeup soon.
00539       if (macQueue.size() > 0)
00540         scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand()*checkInterval, wakeup);
00541       else
00542         scheduleAt(simTime() + slotDuration, wakeup);
00543       macState = SLEEP;
00544       phy->setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00545       changeDisplayColor(BLACK);
00546       lastDataPktSrcAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00547       return;
00548     }
00549     break;
00550   }
00551   opp_error("Undefined event of type %d in state %d (Radio state %d)!",
00552         msg->getKind(), macState, phy->getRadioState());
00553 }
00554 
00555 
00559 void BMacLayer::handleLowerMsg(cMessage *msg)
00560 {
00561   // simply pass the massage as self message, to be processed by the FSM.
00562   handleSelfMsg(msg);
00563 }
00564 
00565 void BMacLayer::sendDataPacket()
00566 {
00567   nbTxDataPackets++;
00568   MacPkt *pkt = macQueue.front()->dup();
00569   attachSignal(pkt);
00570   lastDataPktDestAddr = pkt->getDestAddr();
00571   pkt->setKind(BMAC_DATA);
00572   sendDown(pkt);
00573 }
00574 
00579 void BMacLayer::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg)
00580 {
00581   // Transmission of one packet is over
00582     if(msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::TX_OVER) {
00583       if (macState == WAIT_TX_DATA_OVER)
00584       {
00585         scheduleAt(simTime(), data_tx_over);
00586       }
00587       if (macState == WAIT_ACK_TX)
00588       {
00589         scheduleAt(simTime(), ack_tx_over);
00590       }
00591     }
00592     // Radio switching (to RX or TX) ir over, ignore switching to SLEEP.
00593     else if(msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER) {
00594       // we just switched to TX after CCA, so simply send the first
00595       // sendPremable self message
00596       if ((macState == SEND_PREAMBLE) && (phy->getRadioState() == Radio::TX))
00597       {
00598         scheduleAt(simTime(), send_preamble);
00599       }
00600       if ((macState == SEND_ACK) && (phy->getRadioState() == Radio::TX))
00601       {
00602         scheduleAt(simTime(), send_ack);
00603       }
00604       // we were waiting for acks, but none came. we switched to TX and now
00605       // need to resend data
00606       if ((macState == SEND_DATA) && (phy->getRadioState() == Radio::TX))
00607       {
00608         scheduleAt(simTime(), resend_data);
00609       }
00610 
00611     }
00612     else {
00613         debugEV << "control message with wrong kind -- deleting\n";
00614     }
00615     delete msg;
00616 }
00617 
00622 bool BMacLayer::addToQueue(cMessage *msg)
00623 {
00624   if (macQueue.size() >= queueLength) {
00625     // queue is full, message has to be deleted
00626     debugEV << "New packet arrived, but queue is FULL, so new packet is"
00627           " deleted\n";
00628     msg->setName("MAC ERROR");
00629     msg->setKind(PACKET_DROPPED);
00630     sendControlUp(msg);
00631     droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::QUEUE);
00632     emit(BaseLayer::catDroppedPacketSignal, &droppedPacket);
00633     nbDroppedDataPackets++;
00634 
00635     return false;
00636   }
00637 
00638   MacPkt *macPkt = new MacPkt(msg->getName());
00639   macPkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00640   cObject *const cInfo = msg->removeControlInfo();
00641   //EV<<"CSMA received a message from upper layer, name is "
00642   //  << msg->getName() <<", CInfo removed, mac addr="
00643   //  << cInfo->getNextHopMac()<<endl;
00644   macPkt->setDestAddr(getUpperDestinationFromControlInfo(cInfo));
00645   delete cInfo;
00646   macPkt->setSrcAddr(myMacAddr);
00647 
00648   assert(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00649   macPkt->encapsulate(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00650 
00651   macQueue.push_back(macPkt);
00652   debugEV << "Max queue length: " << queueLength << ", packet put in queue"
00653         "\n  queue size: " << macQueue.size() << " macState: "
00654         << macState << endl;
00655   return true;
00656 }
00657 
00658 void BMacLayer::attachSignal(MacPkt *macPkt)
00659 {
00660   //calc signal duration
00661   simtime_t duration = macPkt->getBitLength() / bitrate;
00662   //create and initialize control info with new signal
00663   setDownControlInfo(macPkt, createSignal(simTime(), duration, txPower, bitrate));
00664 }
00665 
00670 void BMacLayer::changeDisplayColor(BMAC_COLORS color)
00671 {
00672   if (!animation)
00673     return;
00674   cDisplayString& dispStr = findHost()->getDisplayString();
00675   //b=40,40,rect,black,black,2"
00676   if (color == GREEN)
00677     dispStr.setTagArg("b", 3, "green");
00678     //dispStr.parse("b=40,40,rect,green,green,2");
00679   if (color == BLUE)
00680     dispStr.setTagArg("b", 3, "blue");
00681         //dispStr.parse("b=40,40,rect,blue,blue,2");
00682   if (color == RED)
00683     dispStr.setTagArg("b", 3, "red");
00684         //dispStr.parse("b=40,40,rect,red,red,2");
00685   if (color == BLACK)
00686     dispStr.setTagArg("b", 3, "black");
00687         //dispStr.parse("b=40,40,rect,black,black,2");
00688   if (color == YELLOW)
00689     dispStr.setTagArg("b", 3, "yellow");
00690         //dispStr.parse("b=40,40,rect,yellow,yellow,2");
00691 }
